industry_and_process.raw_materials: xylen; 2-ethoxy-1-methylethyl acetat; Solventnaphtha (råolie), let aromatisk; n-Butylacetat; ethylbenzen; 2,3-epoxypropylneodecanoat

requirements_and_constraints.regulatory_requirements: Dette produkt er klassificeret som farligt i henhold til forordning (EF) 1272/2008 med ændringer. Seveso-direktivet - tærskelværdier for indberetning P5c.
requirements_and_constraints.safety_requirements: Brandfarlig væske og damp. Anvend eksplosionssikret ventilationsudstyr. Foretag forebyggende forholdsregler imod elektrostatiske udladninger.

data_quality_issues.issue: No exhaust measurement data (flow rate, pollutant concentrations, TVOC) provided; SDS only
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Prevents sizing of abatement equipment and mass balance; cannot estimate capture and removal requirements without inlet loads
examples: No m3/h, ppm or mg/Nm3 values for emissions in document

data_quality_issues.issue: Oxygen content not measured/reported
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Affects LEL, oxidation design, and explosion protection assessment

data_quality_issues.issue: Temperature value refers to flammability test condition (Flammepunkt: Lukket beholder: 25degC) not actual process exhaust temperature
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Using this value for design could misrepresent thermal design and condensation risk

data_quality_issues.issue: Potential presence of carcinogenic ethylbenzen noted in national list, but no emission concentrations provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Carcinogen handling may require stricter emission controls and monitoring; lack of concentrations increases compliance uncertainty
examples: Danmark's kræftfremkaldende stoffer: Ethylbenzen Optaget på liste

industry_and_process.raw_materials: Hexamethylendiisocyanate, oligomer; 2-Methoxy-1-methylethylacetat; xylen; Ethyl Benzene; Hexamethylen-1,6-diisocyanat

requirements_and_constraints.regulatory_requirements: Er i overensstemmelse med Forordning (EF) nr. 1907/2006 (REACH), bilag II, med senere tilpasning i henhold til Forordning (EU) nr. 2020/878 - Danmark; Forordning (EF) nr. 1272/2008 [CLP/GHS]; Seveso Direktiv Kategori P5c
requirements_and_constraints.atex_classification: Seveso-direktivet Kategori P5c; Brandklasse II-1; Mal-kode (1993): 5-3
requirements_and_constraints.safety_requirements: Indeholder isocyanater. Kan udløse allergisk reaktion.; Brandfarlig væske og damp.; Brug egnede beskyttelseshandsker. Bær beskyttelse til øjne og ansigt.; Holdes væk fra varme, varme overflader, gnister, åben ild og andre antændelseskilder. Rygning forbudt.

data_quality_issues.issue: No exhaust air flow rate provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Prevents mass balance and sizing of abatement equipment

data_quality_issues.issue: No exhaust temperature provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Affects selection of materials, condensation risk, and treatment efficiency

data_quality_issues.issue: No pressure data (draft/static) provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Impacts fan sizing and integration with abatement systems

data_quality_issues.issue: No humidity data provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Impacts oxidation by-product formation and catalyst selection

data_quality_issues.issue: No oxygen content provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Affects LEL calculations and explosion protection assessment

data_quality_issues.issue: No measured VOC concentrations in exhaust air
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Prevents load calculation and technology selection for emission compliance

data_quality_issues.issue: Safety Data Sheet lists hazardous ingredients but not emission concentrations
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Composition of product does not translate directly to air emission loads
examples: Hexamethylendiisocyanate, oligomer ≥50 - ≤75; 2-Methoxy-1-methylethylacetat ≥10 - <20; xylen ≤12; Ethyl Benzene ≤2.7; Hexamethylen-1,6-diisocyanat ≤0.43

data_quality_issues.issue: Potential presence of Ethyl Benzene (possible carcinogen by some classifications) without emission limits
data_quality_issues.impact_description: May trigger stricter regulatory controls and monitoring
examples: Ethyl Benzene listed as ingredient with STOT RE 2 and aspiration hazard

requirements_and_constraints.regulatory_requirements: Europa-Parlamentets og Rådets direktiv 2010/75/EU af 24. november 2010 om industrielle emissioner (integreret forebyggelse og bekæmpelse af forurening)
requirements_and_constraints.safety_requirements: Produktet må kun bruges i områder, hvor åben ild og andre antændelseskilder er udelukkede. Materialet kan oplades elektrostatisk: ved omfyldning må der kun anven-des jordede ledninger. Det tilrådes at benytte antistatisk toj inkl. fodtoj. Anvend gnist-sikkert værktoj.

data_quality_issues.issue: No exhaust flow rate provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Prevents sizing of abatement equipment and residence time calculations

data_quality_issues.issue: No measured VOC concentrations in exhaust air
data_quality_issues.impact_description: High uncertainty in emission load, technology selection and compliance assessment

data_quality_issues.issue: Oxygen content not provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Affects explosion risk assessment and combustion-based technology feasibility

data_quality_issues.issue: Humidity not provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Influences adsorption capacity, corona/UV efficiency, and corrosion risk

data_quality_issues.issue: Pressure not provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Impacts duct/system integration and fan sizing

data_quality_issues.issue: Particulate load not provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: May lead to fouling of catalysts/adsorbers if particulates are present

data_quality_issues.issue: Potential carcinogen in components list (ethylbenzen flagged in DK OEL note) but no emission data
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Requires careful monitoring and potential stricter limits; lack of emission data increases compliance risk
examples: DK OEL note: "Betyder, at stoffet er optaget på listen over stoffer, der anses for at være kræftfremkaldende." for ethylbenzen

industry_and_process.raw_materials: SEEVENAX-Härter / Hardener 128; Hærder på basis af polyamin / aminoaddukt; opløsningsmidler: 2-methylpropan-1-ol; Aromatic hydrocarbons, C9; xylen; 1-methoxy-2-propanol; ethylbenzen; butan-1-ol

requirements_and_constraints.regulatory_requirements: Europa-Parlamentets og Rådets direktiv 2010/75/EU; Flygtige organiske forbindelser (VOC) indhold: 59,81 %, 600 g/l; MAL-Kodenummer: 5-3 (1993); REACH bilag XVII begrænsninger (Nummer på listen 3)
requirements_and_constraints.atex_classification: Eksplosionsfare omtalt: Produktet må kun bruges i områder, hvor åben ild og andre antændelseskilder er udelukkede. Materialet kan oplades elektrostatisk
requirements_and_constraints.safety_requirements: Brandbeskyttelse; antistatisk udstyr og tøj; åndedrætsværn ved overskridelse af luftgrænseværdier; gnistsikkert værktøj; ventilation; hånd- og øjenbeskyttelse

data_quality_issues.issue: No exhaust air measurement data (TVOC, individual VOC concentrations in mg/Nm3 or ppm) provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Prevents sizing of abatement system and assessment of destruction/removal efficiency requirements
examples: SDS lists formulation components and hazards but no stack gas concentrations

data_quality_issues.issue: Process flow rate not provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Prevents equipment sizing and residence time calculations

data_quality_issues.issue: Temperature, humidity, and pressure of exhaust not provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Impacts technology selection (condensation risk, adsorption performance, oxidation kinetics) and ATEX assessment

data_quality_issues.issue: Oxygen content not provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Affects LEL calculations and explosion protection assessment for thermal/oxidative treatments

data_quality_issues.issue: Operating schedule not provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Impacts activated carbon changeout and maintenance scheduling; affects CAPEX/OPEX modeling

data_quality_issues.issue: Potential carcinogen (ethylbenzen) flagged in OEL notes without emission data
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Requires consideration of occupational exposure and emission limits; emission concentrations unknown
examples: Yderligere oplysninger: Stoffet anses for at kunne være kræftfremkaldende, Vejledende liste over organiske opløsningsmidler

data_quality_issues.issue: No exhaust air flow, temperature, pressure, humidity, or oxygen content data provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Prevents sizing of abatement equipment, LEL assessment, heat/mass balance, and materials selection

data_quality_issues.issue: Pollutant concentrations in exhaust air not provided
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Cannot determine loading, catalyst/adsorbent sizing, or compliance margins

data_quality_issues.issue: Only SDS information provided; workplace exposure limits shown but no emission measurements
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Introduces high uncertainty when translating product composition to air emission profiles
examples: Gr�e6nsev�e6rdier for erhvervsm�e6ssig eksponering listed (DK OEL, 2000/39/EC, 2019/1831/EU) without stack measurements

data_quality_issues.issue: Potential particulate emissions (titandioxid) not quantified
data_quality_issues.impact_description: Affects need for prefiltration and dust handling before VOC treatment
examples: Stoffer med en gr�e6nsev�e6rdi for erhvervsm�e6ssig eksponering : titandioxid

data_quality_issues.issue: CARCINOGEN RISK IN PRODUCTION PROCESS not indicated by documents
data_quality_issues.impact_description: No explicit Group 1/2A carcinogens detected in listed components; continue to verify in broader process context
